=== Jonathan Lozinski ===

Email: j_lozinski AT yahoo DOT co DOT uk

Jonathan Lozinski is a web-developer in the North East of England.  Using ubuntu at home and at work, seeking to help the ubuntu love as much as possible.

He is working on a front-end to dans-guardian which he hopes to have complete before his little girl needs it.

Jonathan has had very small involvement with Pitivi, which is the future of video editing on Linux.

He is currently concerned with getting Ubuntu working as slick as possible on the Acer Aspire One netbook.
